meanings.sent1: She was exteriorizing her feelings by painting bright colors on the walls.
meanings.sent2: The architect was exteriorizing the design of the new building to include more windows.
meanings.sent3: The cat was exteriorizing its excitement by running around the house in circles.
meanings.sent4: The sunrise was exteriorizing its beauty across the sky, painting it with vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The artist was exteriorizing the emotions of joy and freedom through bold brush strokes on the canvas.

meanings.sent1: He was exteriorizing his happiness by smiling brightly at everyone he met.
meanings.sent2: The singer was exteriorizing her emotions through the powerful lyrics of the song.
meanings.sent3: The clown was exteriorizing his silliness by juggling colorful balls at the party.
meanings.sent4: The storm was exteriorizing its fury with thunder and lightning in the dark sky.
meanings.sent5: The dancer was exteriorizing the story of love and loss through graceful movements on stage.
